SEARCH
Package repository

Interface Repository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>>

Type Parameters:
ID - - the type of the identifier used for entities
E - - the type of the entities managed by the repository, which extends Entity
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFileRepository, InMemoryRepository, UserFileRepository
public interface Repository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>>
Interface defining basic CRUD operations for a repository that manages entities of type E with an identifier of type ID.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    E
    delete(ID id)
    Deletes the entity with the given ID from the repository.
    Iterable<E>
    findAll()
    Returns all entities managed by the repository.
    E
    findOne(ID id)
    Finds and returns the entity with the given ID.
    E
    save(E entity)
    Saves a new entity to the repository.
    E
    update(E entity)
    Updates an existing entity in the repository.

  • Method Details

    • findOne

      E findOne(ID id)
      Finds and returns the entity with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - - the ID of the entity to be found, must not be null
      Returns:
      E - the entity with the specified ID, or null if no such entity exists

    • findAll

      Iterable<E> findAll()
      Returns all entities managed by the repository.
      Returns:
      Iterable - a collection of all entities

    • save

      E save(E entity)
      Saves a new entity to the repository. If the entity already exists, it is not saved.
      Parameters:
      entity - - the entity to be saved, must not be null
      Returns:
      E - null if the entity was successfully saved, or the existing entity if it already exists

    • delete

      E delete(ID id)
      Deletes the entity with the given ID from the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - - the ID of the entity to be deleted, must not be null
      Returns:
      E - the deleted entity, or null if no such entity exists

    • update

      E update(E entity)
      Updates an existing entity in the repository. If the entity doesn't exist, it is not updated.
      Parameters:
      entity - - the entity to be updated, must not be null
      Returns:
      E - null if the entity was successfully updated, or the existing entity if it doesn't exist
